en.dictionary:activateChineseDescription: This enables word lookup for ancient Chinese texts. Word meanings are from the Digital Dictionary of Buddhism.
en.dictionary:activatePaliDescription: Analyzes the Pali text and attempts to display the word meaning. Note that this is an aid only, and is not always accurate. Word meanings are from the New Concise Pali English Dictionary.
en.dictionary:changePaliScriptDescription: This enables you to read the Pali text in various scripts.
en.dictionary:chineseLookupDictionaryDisabl: The 汉语 lookup dictionary is now disabled.
en.dictionary:metaDescriptionText: Early Buddhist texts and modern translations. Suttas (sutras) from the Tipitaka (Tripitaka) in Pali, Chinese, Sanskrit, and Tibetan with the Buddha's teachings on mindfulness, insight, wisdom, and meditation.
en.dictionary:noteDescription: Where available, view comments on the translation and variant readings for root texts.
en.dictionary:noteSummary: Show notes and variants in segmented texts
en.dictionary:paliLookupDictionaryDisabled: The Pali lookup dictionary is now disabled.
en.dictionary:referenceDescription: “Main” displays the primary SuttaCentral references for segmented texts, and all references for other texts. Remaining items are extra Pali editions.
en.dictionary:showHighlightingDescription: Where applicable, highlight the text to show extra details such as variant readings, corrections, structure, etc.
en.dictionary:textViewDescription: Some texts on SuttaCentral are “segmented”; the original text and translation are approximately matched line by line. For such texts, see both root text and translation.
en.layout:pageSubtitle: Early Buddhist texts, translations, and parallels
en.navigation:metaDescriptionText: Early Buddhist texts and modern translations. Suttas (sutras) from the Tipitaka (Tripitaka) in Pali, Chinese, Sanskrit, and Tibetan with the Buddha's teachings on mindfulness, insight, wisdom, and meditation.
en.parallel:fullParallel: Full parallel: different versions of the same text.
en.parallel:mention: Mention: one text is quoted or mentioned in another.
en.parallel:retellingParallel: Retelling: the events of one text are retold in another.
en.search:metaDescriptionText: Early Buddhist texts and modern translations. Suttas (sutras) from the Tipitaka (Tripitaka) in Pali, Chinese, Sanskrit, and Tibetan with the Buddha's teachings on mindfulness, insight, wisdom, and meditation.
en.selector:metaDescriptionText: Early Buddhist texts and modern translations. Suttas (sutras) from the Tipitaka (Tripitaka) in Pali, Chinese, Sanskrit, and Tibetan with the Buddha's teachings on mindfulness, insight, wisdom, and meditation.
en.selector:metaKeywords: Buddha, Buddhism, Buddhist, sutta, sutra, tipitaka, tripitaka, wisdom, teaching, mindfulness, meditation, scripture, canon, Pali, Sanskrit, Tibetan, Chinese, insight, vipassana
en.suttaplex:hasNoParallels: This text has no recorded parallels.
en.text:languagePromptMessage: You can change the language from the menu in the toolbar.
en.text:metaDescriptionText: Early Buddhist texts and modern translations. Suttas (sutras) from the Tipitaka (Tripitaka) in Pali, Chinese, Sanskrit, and Tibetan with the Buddha's teachings on mindfulness, insight, wisdom, and meditation.
